subject: PGA Championship
Golf
lead_paragraph: After not playing well this season, the former No. 1-ranked players Rory McIlroy and Martin Kaymer were happy with their scores so far at the P.G.A. Championship, which each has won.
snippet: After not playing well this season, the former No. 1-ranked players Rory McIlroy and Martin Kaymer were happy with their scores so far at the P.G.A. Championship, which each has won.
